gold.user: User wants to retrieve the add-on results for a specific recording identified by its ReferenceSid and Sid.
gold.ideal: The API should return the details of the add-on results for the specified recording.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific add-on result associated with a recording using its Sid.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified add-on result.

gold.user: User wants to list all add-on results for a specific recording identified by its ReferenceSid.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all add-on results related to the specified recording.
